dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool will subset and download data from web-based servers which support the OPeNDAP protocol. Users can constrain which data are downloaded by specifying specific variables, a spatial extent and starting and ending values of the dimensions which define a variable.

tool.name: OPeNDAPtoNetCDF

param.name: in_opendap_dataset
param.dialogReference: The URL that references the remote OPeNDAP dataset.

param.name: variable
param.dialogReference: The NetCDF variable, or variables, that will be extracted from the OPeNDAP dataset.

param.name: out_netcdf_file
param.dialogReference: The name of the output NetCDF file.

param.name: extent
param.dialogReference: The output extent of the NetCDF file.

param.name: dimension
param.dialogReference: The starting and ending values of the dimensions used to constrain which data will be extracted from the remote server.

tool.summary: This tool will subset and download data from web-based servers which support the OPeNDAP protocol. Users can constrain which data are downloaded by specifying specific variables, a spatial extent and starting and ending values of the dimensions which define a variable.

scriptExample.title: OPeNDAPtoNetCDF example 1 (Python window)
scriptExample.para: Extracts a file from a remote server without spatial or dimensional subsetting.

scriptExample.title: OPeNDAPtoNetCDF example 2 (Python window)
scriptExample.para: Extract a file from a remote server with spatial subsetting.

scriptExample.title: OPeNDAPtoNetCDF example 3 (stand-alone script)
scriptExample.para: Extract a file from a remote server with spatial and dimensional subsetting.
scriptExample.code:
import arcpy
# Import custom toolbox arcpy.ImportToolbox("c:/tools/Multidimension Supplemental Tools.pyt")
in_url = "http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/thredds/dodsC/Datasets/ncep/air.1979.nc" variable = "air" out_file = "C:/data/air.1979.nc" extent = "0 -50 357.5 50" dimension = "time '1979-01-01 00:00:00' '1979-12-31 00:00:00';level 1000 50"
arcpy.OPeNDAPtoNetCDF_mds(in_url, variable, out_file, extent, dimension, "BY_VALUE")
